name: Kiba Inu
public_notice:
Kiba Inu has migrated from V1 to V2. Visit here for more info.
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Kiba Inu is a community driven ERC20 token that is on a mission to continue to grow to be known worldwide. The Journey starts today, will you change your life forever?

$KIBA is inspired by Kiba Inuzuka, one of the main supporting characters of the Naruto anime/manga series. He always has his trusted canine companion, Akamaru, by his side.

Kiba Inuzuka is loyal to his comrades and will do anything to protect them. This is the energy the $KIBA token aims to embody - a strong, supportive community that wants to grow together.
